info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 7 at 12:18PM AKST until November 8 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks AK
info.description:
* WHAT...Patchy areas of freezing drizzle, occasionally mixed with light snow, will be possible through this evening in and around the Fairbanks area.
* WHERE...Eielson AFB and Salcha, Fairbanks Metro Area, and Two Rivers.
* WHEN...Until midnight AKST tonight.
* IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday evening commute.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...More persistent snowfall is expected tonight, which should end the threat of freezing drizzle once this occurs.
info.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
Be prepared for slippery roads. Slow down and use caution while driving. If you are going outside, watch your first few steps taken on stairs, sidewalks, and driveways. These surfaces could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.

parameter.value: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT AKST TONIGHT

area.areaDesc: Eielson AFB and Salcha; Two Rivers; Fairbanks Metro Area
